content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution. Just want to let you know that we are currently in feature freeze. This means that we cannot accept new features, such as this pull-request, until after we have frozen the code and created the gazebo 3.0 branch. This will likely take about another week.

Note to maintainers: This pull request can be merged in after the other pull-requests have been merged and the gazebo 3.0 branch created.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution. Just want to let you know that we are currently in feature freeze. This means that we cannot accept new features, such as this pull-request, until after we have frozen the code and created the gazebo 3.0 branch. This will likely take about another week.

Note to maintainers: This pull request can be merged in after the other pull-requests have been merged and the gazebo 3.0 branch created.
